Grouped_Utterances: I guess I’d like to work on being more confident in my decisions, especially at work.

That’s good to hear! Last time, we talked a bit about your temper and some of the things you'd like to change about yourself, like being more outgoing. Have you thought about that since we last spoke? Yeah, I have actually. I’ve been trying to be a bit more social lately. I went to a small gathering with friends. It was fun! I talked to a few new people, but I still felt a bit shy at times. I think it’s just my nature. I worry about saying the wrong thing or not being interesting enough. Actually, yes! I had a small argument with my sister again, but I took a moment to breathe before responding, and it helped a lot. Sometimes I doubt my ideas or worry that they won’t be well-received. I feel a bit nervous, but I think it’s worth a try.
Yeah, when I was talking to a friend about our favorite shows, I felt really relaxed. She seemed surprised but appreciated that I was calm. We ended up talking it out instead of arguing.

I’ve been trying to remind myself that it’s okay to be myself and that not every conversation has to be perfect. I’ve been thinking about speaking up more in meetings, even if it’s just to share a small thought.
It definitely is! Remember, every small step counts. How about we set a goal for you to share at least one idea in your next meeting? That sounds good! I’ll definitely try to do that.
